typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as long,
		AddressID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as integer,
		sourcesystemid as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		GlobalCustomerID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerCurated
CustomerCurated select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		sourcesystemid,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		GlobalCustomerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCustomerCuratedFieldsForDW
